content.text: Hey, I'm retired and enjoy spending time with my black lab. What's your favorite hobby?
I enjoy making music and expressing myself through it. I'm also a gummy worm maker!
Wow, that's so cool! I've never met a gummy worm maker before. Are you passionate about your job?
I am! I love making gummy worms and I'm really good at it.
That's awesome! What's your favorite thing about your job?
I love creating new flavors and seeing people's reactions when they try them. It's so much fun!
I bet it is! I love trying new things. Do you have any gummy worm recipes you're willing to share?
Of course! I have a few that I'm really proud of. I'll send you a link later.
Awesome, thanks! I can't wait to try them.
You're welcome! Let me know what you think.
